meta.article_title: August 29, 2011 - Suggested equipment for beginning and intermediate players

suggested_equipment_players.probleme: Choosing the right equipment for beginners and intermediate players

debutant.description: For beginners, a medium speed blade is recommended to help with control.

intermediaire.description: For more advanced players, a medium to fast blade is recommended.

exercices_complementaires.nom: trying out different rubber and rackets
exercices_complementaires.description: Beginners should try out different rubber and rackets to find what fits their game.

exercices_complementaires.nom: finding a racket that feels right
exercices_complementaires.description: Players should find a racket that feels right when hitting with it.

metriques_progression.description: For beginners, start with a sponge in the 1.5 to 1.9mm range.

erreurs_a_eviter.description: Few players can control ultra-fast blades, so they should be avoided.
